name: Coles I'M Perfect Apples Prepacked 2kg
description: A mix of perfectly imperfect Australian apples, helping to reduce food waste. Sizes, shapes, and colours may vary depending on the season, but they taste just as delicious!

details: Supports farmers by selling more of their crop
details.text: Our I'm Perfect Apples are quirky and come in various sizes, shapes, and colours. They are Australian grown and help prevent quality fresh produce from going to waste.
details.storage: Best kept refrigerated to maintain freshness.

name: Coles Cavendish Bananas

notes.text: Price is per kilogram, individual weight may vary.

description: Fresh and nutritious Cavendish bananas, a great source of potassium and energy. Perfect for snacking, smoothies, or baking.

details.text: Coles Cavendish Bananas are a popular choice for their sweet taste and creamy texture. Sourced with quality in mind.
details.storage: Store at room temperature. To slow ripening, refrigerate (skin may darken).

name: Coles Carrots Prepacked 1kg
description: Fresh Australian carrots, prepacked for convenience. A versatile vegetable, great for cooking, snacking, or juicing.

details.text: These Australian grown carrots are super versatile and a staple in any kitchen. Best stored in the crisper section of your refrigerator.
details.storage: Best kept refrigerated in the crisper drawer.

name: Coles Organic Broccoli 500g
description: Coles Organic Broccoli is certified organic and free from synthetic chemicals. Fresh and nutritious, perfect for steaming, stir-frying, or roasting.

details.text: All Coles Organic produce is certified organic and completely free from synthetic chemicals such as pesticides, herbicides and genetically modified ingredients. Australian Grown.

name: Lilydale Free Range Chicken Breast Fillets Bulk Pack approx. 1kg

notes.text: Raised without antibiotics. No added hormones.

description: Lilydale Free Range Chicken Breast Fillets are sourced from chickens raised without antibiotics and with no added hormones. Versatile for many recipes.

details.text: No added hormones, no added growth promotants. No artificial colours or flavours. No added preservatives.
details.storage: Keep refrigerated. Store at or below 4°C.

name: Drovers Big Pack Value Beef Mince 2kg
description: Drovers Choice Big Pack Value Beef Mince. Made with 100% Australian beef, this large family-size pack is full of flavour and extremely versatile for many dishes.

details.text: Coles partners with Australian farmers who share our passion for quality, great tasting beef. Perfect for burgers, meatballs, lasagnas, and more.
details.storage: Keep refrigerated or freeze for later use. If frozen, thaw in refrigerator.

name: Coles Frozen Salmon Fillets 1kg
description: Rich, flaky Atlantic salmon fillets, individually wrapped for freshness. A good source of Protein & Omega 3. Must be cooked thoroughly prior to consumption.

details: Skin on or skinless may vary
details.text: Farmed Atlantic Salmon (Salmo salar). Thaw prior to cooking. Oven bake or pan fry.
details.storage: Keep frozen. Store at or below minus 18°C. Thaw in refrigerator.

name: Coles Prawns Cooked Peeled Tail Off 750g

notes.text: Ready to eat once thawed. Good source of protein.

description: Naturally sweet warm water prawns, cooked, peeled, and with tails off for convenience. A great addition to your favourite dishes or as a simple snack.

details.text: These prawns are ready to eat once thawed. Keep refrigerated until use and consume within 2 days of thawing. Once thawed do not refreeze.
ingredients: Cooked Prawns (100%) [Farmed Vannamei Prawns (Litopenaeus vannamei) (99%) (Crustacean), Salt, Acidity Regulators (500, 330), Dextrin]
details.ingredientsNote: Contains Crustacean. Made in Vietnam. Despite careful inspection some fragments of shell may remain.
details.storage: Keep Frozen. Store at or below minus 18°C.

name: Coles Bakery White Loaf 800g

notes.text: Baked in-store or sourced from local bakers.

description: A classic soft white bread loaf from Coles Bakery, perfect for sandwiches, toast, or a side with your meal. Made in Australia.

details.text: Breakfast, lunch, dinner or a snack in between - a good sandwich or toasty can fill the gap. Made in Australia from at least 95% Australian ingredients.
ingredients: Wheat Flour [Wheat Flour, Thiamin, Folic Acid], Water, Yeast, Vinegar, Canola Oil, Iodised Salt, Wheat Gluten, Natural Preservative (Fermented Wheat Flour), Soy Flour, Antioxidant (300), Enzyme (Wheat)
details.ingredientsNote: Contains Wheat, Soy, Gluten. May Contain Sesame. No Artificial Flavours or Colours.
details.storage: Store in a cool, dry place. Suitable for freezing.

name: Coles All Butter Croissants 4 Pack 168g
description: Flaky and delicious all-butter croissants from Coles Bakery. Perfect for a breakfast treat or a light snack. Ready to eat or warm in the oven.

details.text: The quintessential French pastry. Bake in the oven for a delicious golden flaky finish. Ready to eat plain or with your favourite filling. Made in Australia from at least 81% Australian ingredients.
ingredients: Wheat Flour [Vitamins (Thiamin, Folic Acid)], Butter (Milk) (18%), Water, Sugar, Iodised Salt, Yeast, Wheat Gluten, Improver [Wheat Flour, Mineral Salt (170), Vegetable Emulsifiers (471, 472e), Thickeners (412, 415)], Barley Malt Flour
details.ingredientsNote: Contains Wheat, Milk, Gluten. May Contain Pecan, Egg, Sesame, Almond, Hazelnut. No Artificial Flavours or Colours. Previously frozen, not suitable for freezing.
details.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container. Store in a cool, dry place.

name: Coles Bakery Double Choc Muffins 4 Pack
description: Soft, fluffy muffins from Coles Bakery, loaded with delicious chocolate chips. A must-try for any chocolate lover, perfect as a snack or dessert.

details.text: Grab one of these muffins if you're rushing out the door, craving a tasty snack or dessert after a meal. Made in Australia from at least 85% Australian ingredients.
ingredients: Wheat Flour, Water, Sugar, Canola Oil, Dark Chocolate (12%) (Cocoa Solids (50%) (Cocoa Liquor^, Cocoa Butter^, Cocoa Powder^), Sugar, Emulsifier (Sunflower Lecithin), Natural Flavour), Cocoa Powder^ (2.5%), Egg Powder, Humectant (422 from Palm**), Whey Powder (Milk), Raising Agents (450, 501 (from Palm**))
details.ingredientsNote: Contains Wheat, Egg, Milk, Gluten. May Contain Pecan, Sesame, Soy, Brazil nut, Macadamia, Pistachio, Walnut, Almond, Hazelnut, Peanut. No Artificial Flavours or Colours.
details.storage: Store in a cool, dry place. Once opened, store in an airtight container.

name: Coles Bakery Wholemeal Bread Loaf 680g
description: A wholesome and tasty wholemeal bread loaf from Coles Bakery. Perfect for sandwiches or toast, offering a good source of fibre.

details.text: This wholemeal bread is a great choice for a healthier option without compromising on taste. Made in Australia.
ingredients: Wholemeal Wheat Flour (55%), Water, Wheat Flour, Yeast, Vinegar, Wheat Gluten, Iodised Salt, Canola Oil, Fermented Wheat Flour, Soy Flour, Malted Barley, Vitamins (Thiamin, Folic Acid), Processing Aid (Wheat)
details.ingredientsNote: Contains Wheat, Soy, Gluten. May Contain Sesame. No Artificial Flavours or Colours.
details.storage: Store in a cool, dry place, out of direct sunlight.

name: Coles Full Cream Milk 2L
description: Fresh and creamy Coles Full Cream Milk. A good source of calcium, perfect for drinking, with cereal, or in your tea and coffee.

details.text: Coles Full Cream Milk is a household staple, providing essential nutrients. Sourced from Australian dairy farms.
ingredients: Homogenised and Pasteurised Full Cream Milk.
details.storage: Keep refrigerated. Store at or below 5°C. Keep this way up.

name: Coles Simply Cheddar Cheese Block 1kg

notes.text: Made with Australian milk. Mild strength.

description: Coles Simply Cheddar Cheese Block, a versatile mild strength cheddar perfect for slicing, grating, or cooking. Made in Australia from at least 99% Australian ingredients.

details.text: This cheddar cheese is a great value option for families. Ideal for sandwiches, cheese boards, or adding to your favourite recipes.
ingredients: Pasteurised Milk, Starter Culture (Milk), Salt, Mineral Salt (509), Enzyme (Vegetarian Rennet).
details.ingredientsNote: Contains Milk. No Artificial Flavours or Colours.
details.storage: Keep refrigerated. Store at or below 5°C.

name: Coles Free Range Eggs 12 Pack 600g
description: Coles Free Range Eggs, a dozen pack from hens that have access to the outdoors. A versatile ingredient for breakfast, baking, or any meal.

details.text: These free-range eggs are a staple for any kitchen. Not to be consumed raw, cook prior to serving.
details.storage: Keep refrigerated after purchase to maintain freshness.

name: Coles Greek Style Natural Yoghurt 1kg

notes.text: Made with Australian milk. No added sugar. Source of Calcium.

description: Thick and creamy Coles Greek Style Natural Yoghurt. Perfect on its own, with fruit and muesli, or as an ingredient in cooking and baking. No added sugar.

details.text: Made in Australia from at least 99% Australian ingredients. This Greek style yoghurt is a versatile and healthy option.
ingredients: Skimmed Milk, Cream (Milk), Milk Solids, Live Yoghurt Cultures (Milk).
details.ingredientsNote: Contains Milk. No Artificial Flavours or Colours.
details.storage: Keep refrigerated. Store at or below 5°C.
